metadata.title: CVE-2024-2880 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.5 prior to 16.11.6, starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.4, andstarting from 17.1 prior to 17.1.2 in which a user with`admin_group_member` custom role permission could ban group members.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
